definition: old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
to open out, to expand/bright, glorious
to talk freely/to discuss without inhibition
lit. fluently saying all one wants (idiom); to preach freely on one's favorite topic/to hold forth to one's heart's content
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
unrestrained/cheerful lack of inhibition, esp. for drinking or sleeping/to drink with abandon

sentences.english: Most of the problems in nurse-patient interaction are related to unfavorable affective communication.
sentences.chinese: 護患交往中的大多數問題都與情感溝通不暢有關。

sentences.english: Longer-term borrowing markets are still mostly shut.
sentences.chinese: 長期借貸市場仍然通路不暢。

sentences.english: Sluggish in the brown-out, it complains, but swallows and digests.
sentences.chinese: 儘管停電讓它工作不暢，但它還是將鞋帶吞噬消化了。

sentences.english: Many misunderstanding of China are to some extent a result of miscommunication.
sentences.chinese: 很多關於中國的誤解在某種程度上都因交流不暢造成。

sentences.english: Restricted refrigerant flow through the condenser.
sentences.chinese: 冷卻劑流經冷凝器不暢。

sentences.english: Road traffic in Europe and more poor.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲多地公路交通不暢。

sentences.english: The herb Ma Huang (ephedra) is traditionally used in China to treat short-term respiratory congestion.
sentences.chinese: 麻黃在中國傳統上用於治療短期的呼吸不暢。

sentences.english: He suffered from gross turbinate, and had difficulties breathing recently.
sentences.chinese: 他患有先天性鼻甲肥大，最近老覺得呼吸不暢。

definition: lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
